page.title: 06Coates Church (Continued)
page.content: a.m. On special occasions there may be a service in the evening. If you are in the choir you can get medals and go to confirmation classes. We have coke and folk at the end of the month and we get paid every three months. Occasionally the choir go to Ely Cathedral and the Sunday School go there each year. The Sunday School teachers are Mrs.Kolokowsky and Mrs.Bagnall. The church does a lot in the village. This year it held a Spring Fete,a Children's Festival and an Easter Play. Anita Hunt's mum and dad clean the church and the Sunday School. The church is dedicated to the Holy Trinity and is on North Green. Rector:Mr.J.Bidder. Sexton:Mr.C.Dale Churchwardens:Mr.C.Dale,Mr.W.Redhead
